Hi Britt, 

Thanks, confirming we have completed the requested updates, here is the link again: https://investmenttrends.com/report/super-member-engagement-report/

To answer point 4, yes, other reports will populate once they are loaded.

Hi @chris done following task

1. ✅ Enquire button > anchor link "enquire" where Allison is with the form.
2. ✅ Preview > Can we please update the fields on custom post to only show when data is entered?
3. ✅ Watch video button tile > Can we please update the fields on custom post to only show when data is entered?

4. View other reports > I suspect the answer is yes, correct?
**Yes they can add the link

Time: +15mins

5. It also appears the "testimonials" section has reverted back to previous sizing, may be a cache issue?
**Hello @joel , I could use your assistance with the testimonial section. The updates don't seem to take effect. I already cleared the cached but still not working. 

It looks fine when logged in. Here's a screenshot for reference. ( https://investmenttrends.com/report/super-member-engagement-report/ )


When not logged in

hi @jaime here is how I understand Britt's request:

2. Preview > Can we please update the fields on custom post to only show when data is entered?
3. Watch video button tile > Can we please update the fields on custom post to only show when data is entered?

It also appears the "testimonials" section has reverted back to previous sizing, may be a cache issue?

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris, This looks great. Just a few small adjustments/comments:
  • Enquire button, can this pan down to the Enquire now section like we discussed
  • Preview button, just want to confirm we will be able to link this to a PDF? I will need to do this at a later stage as these have not been created yet
  • Watch video button tile, can we please remove for this report as it does not have a video. This will be specified in each report if it has a video or not
  • View other reports, will the team link these buttons to the new reports pages once they have created them?
Otherwise, we are good to go! Thanks, Britt Brittany Tan Senior Marketing Manager P +61 2 8248 8000 investmenttrends.com

Hi Britt, 

Great news, the first upload is ready for your review: https://investmenttrends.com/report/super-member-engagement-report/

There were some minor tweaks to get things sorted for easy uploads. The initial upload and adjustments took us 1 hour. 

We expect each report to upload to take 5-10 mins.

Hi @chris done updating following task

  • missing “This report will help you understand:” This can be a new line.
  • Customer typo - missing full stop after Cell C3.
  • Customer typo - tor > for
https://investmenttrends.com/report/super-member-engagement-report/
